alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Wayne County through 645 PM EDT... At 615 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Burfield, or 7 miles south of Monticello, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Oil Valley and Barrier around 625 PM EDT. Monticello around 635 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Steubenville and Betsey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
